A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Saw this last night\, and truly enjoyed it. I'm completely shocked at all of the 1/2 and 1-star reviews that say this is the worst star wars movie ever. 

It's not. 

The acting\, dialogue and story telling were fantastic. I'm relegated to believe that all the negative reviews generate from either trolls with straw accounts or poor souls that have invested more into a fictional story than into their real lives. What ever the case\, I encourage you to see the last Jedi.
